product_details.description: Super Breathable Mesh Vamp: Lightweight, Soft, Comfortable, Wash resistance, They won't deform after clean the sneakers. Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe. Protect Your ankle: Slip-on ankle design allows you easily put on/off. Shoes's tongue and heels protect your feet from hurt in any activities. Provide more comfort. Slip-Resistance and Durable:Premium Hollow Blade Sole Offers Maximum Durability and Provides the Optimum Cushioning Performance that Creates a Slow Shock Jump, Soft, Comfortableand and Healthier Shoe Environment. Perfect choice to pair with any sport or casual assemble. Suitable for parties, casual, walking, running, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, exercise, workout and any occasion. Free Running: Stretch breathable mesh upper for ultra-lightweight support and breathability, springblade sole can superb energy return and durability, ensures your feet feel more freedom, allowing to move the way they were meant to, to enjoy the unparalleled pleasure of free running. Fabric type - Mesh ** Origin - Imported ** Sole material - Ethylene Vinyl Acetate ** Outer material - Mesh **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, high-impact layout designed to promote athletic footwear. The background uses layered curves and subtle circular highlights in varying dark gray tones for depth. In the top center, the bold "heading" text stands out in a futuristic font, followed by the slightly smaller "subheading" text which describes the product feature. The central element is a high-resolution image of sneakers ("product_image") sharply overlaid to draw visual focus. Below, the bold "price" text is prominently displayed in white, creating emphasis. A dark rectangular "cta_button" holds the compelling "cta" text, inviting action. Minimalist grid accents enhance modernity and balance.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #1A1A1A
- Charcoal Gray: #272727
- Gunmetal Gray: #2C2C2C
- Dim Gray: #333333
- Slate Gray: #444444
- Cool White: #FFFFFF
- Light Gray: #CCCCCC
product_color: The product image features sleek, modern footwear with a bold black and white color scheme, giving it a futuristic and athletic appeal. Black (#000000) dominates the design, exuding strength and sophistication, while white (#FFFFFF) accents appear on the strap lettering and side stripes, adding contrast and highlighting key design elements. A touch of dark gray (#2A2A2A) is subtly blended into the mesh and sole areas, enhancing texture and depth. The colors are effectively contrasted, drawing the viewer’s focus to the shoe's aerodynamic structure. For an advertisement banner, combining these tones with a metallic silver (#C0C0C0) background can amplify visual impact.
